title: Eclipse33
author: Eclipse33
created_time: June 06, 2022, 11:59:47 PMLast edit: June 07, 2022, 07:59:35 PM by Eclipse33
content: Eclipse Poster 3rd Editon Drops 6/7/22 at 3:30pm Eastern Time. 33 sets, dual panel release. First come first serve basis. No Preorders. More details and photos at drop @3:30pm Eastern Time.  Countdown clock: https://www.timeanddate.com/countdown/generic?iso=20220607T1530&p0=198&msg=Poster+Drop+&font=sanserif

comments.body: 3:30PM forum time or under the dome time?

comments.author: thiago007
comments.body: Hey Buddy the images look amazing, will you put higher resolution photos where we can see more from the front..?

comments.author: kryme
comments.body: For future drops - you should allow people to "hold" their serial number from previous orders like cryptoart.com does. I see the value in auctions #1 and #21 but all the other ones you should definitely give priority to previous buyers
